page.title: 04THE TERRITORIAL ARMY
page.content: The Territorial Army Headquarters was opened by Her Majesty the Queen, accompanied by the Duke of Edinburgh on March 16th.1984.The building has a canteen,a leisure room and a drill hall where they have map reading. Here they clean and strip their weapons blindfolded.If the cadets stay overnight they have to sleep in the drill hall.The firing range is thirty metres long and the target can be altered to represent a man at 300 yards,200 yards and 100 yards.There is a food store and a cadet is given a box with dry rations,enough for twenty four hours.The full time staff are a captain,one sergeant major,one colour sergeant,one clerk,a vehicle mechanic and a caretaker.Thirty army cadets meet on Wednesdays and Fridays and the air cadets meet on Mondays and Thursdays.
